title: crashing in game and only started this patch
body: im crashing about everything 5 minutes in game in this patch and because of how long my loading screen takes ive been put in to low priority que, but basically i cant play league at all i play for 5 minutes crash and load for 5 mnutes and repeat i just want to know if anyones found a solution for the crashing because it seems a lot of people are experiencing it if not im gonna have to wait for the next patch to play

replies.body: Hey i have the exact same problem. Every since the patch update i cant play a single game without crashing in the first 5 minutes! Or if i do, i crash mid-game for a good 10mins... I hope they fix this soon! Otherwise like u said, we gonna have play again next patch
yeah and it sucks so bad because now i have nothing to do in my spare time, usually ill be playing league but i crash no matter what i try
its all from this patch mate.. :(
